arts.ttl: West Ham performance deserved more - Potter
arts.sum: West Ham United head coach Graham Potter praises his side's "pleasing" performance that "maybe deserved more", and that his side "looks ready to fight" following their 1-1 draw with Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery confirms Aston Villa are in talks over move for former Tottenham player in late January deal as he praises the defender's 'quality'
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery has confirmed that the club are in talks over a move for a former Tottenham player that he has previously worked with.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs West Ham: Confirmed Lineups, Team News and Score Prediction
arts.sum: Aston Villa vs West Ham: Sunday 26th January 2025, 16:30 GMT Aston Villa are looking for a repeat of their FA Cup win over West Ham earlier this month when the pair lock horns in the Premier League t...

arts.ttl: “Well deserved” | West Ham battle their way to a point against Aston Villa
arts.sum: West Ham battle for a well deserved point in the face of ghastly officiating at Villa Park. As a football fan you learn to accept that you will see bad officiating, it’s simply part of the game. Unfortunately, the standard of referees in the Premier League, the best league in the world, simply is unacceptable.... The post “Well deserved” | West Ham battle their way to a point against Aston Villa appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Emerson rescues point for West Ham against Aston Villa
arts.sum: A second-half header from Emerson earned West Ham United a deserved 1-1 draw with Aston Villa, as Graham Potter's team produced an encouraging display at Villa Park. An excellent Jacob Ramsey goal had given the hosts the lead after eight minutes before they lost defender Tyrone Mings to a worrying knee injury.

arts.ttl: West Ham in the race to sign 29-year-old Bundesliga ace this month
arts.sum: Portuguese International striker André Silva has been linked with the move away from RB Leipzig this month. The German outfit are open to letting the player leave and they are willing to send him out on loan or a permanent transfer. According to Philipp Hinze, West Ham United are in the race to secure his […] The post West Ham in the race to sign 29-year-old Bundesliga ace this month appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: West Ham set for transfer windfall as playmaker nears Saudi move
arts.sum: Former West Ham United midfielder Said Benrahma is reportedly closing in on a move to Saudi Arabia. According to Footmercato, the 29-year-old’s representatives are close to securing an agreement over a January transfer. His move to Saudi Arabia will result in a transfer windfall for the Hammers. arts.ttl: Unai Emery admits Aston Villa interest in centre-back Juan Foyth
arts.sum: Villa are looking to add to their squad before the end of the January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano: Aston Villa 'In Talks' for 'Main Target'
arts.sum: Aston Villa are keen on signing the defender who 'grew' under Unai Emery and has Premier League experience.

arts.ttl: The Aston Villa weakness Celtic could exploit identified by Unai Emery as McGinn sparks Champions League hype train
arts.sum: Injuries in a key position look like they could cause issues for Aston Villa as they prepare to welcome the Hoops
